title: Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Delete a data store
abstract:
# Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Delete a data store
This page describes how to delete a data store.
content:
## Before you begin
Make sure that you understand the following requirements for deleting a data store. These vary depending on the type of data store that you have.
### Structured and unstructured data stores
Before attempting to delete a structured or unstructured data store, be aware of the following:
- **A structured or unstructured data store must be empty before you can deleteit.** If your data store contains data, [purge the data from the datastore](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/delete-datastores) .
- **You can't delete a data store that is connected to an app.** If your data store is connected to an app, you must [delete the app](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/delete-engine) that it is connected to.
### Website data stores
Before attempting to delete a website data store, be aware of the following:
- **You can't delete a data store that is connected to an app.** If your data store is connected to an app, you must [delete the app](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/delete-engine) that it is connected to.
- **You can't delete a data store that is in the process of upgrading toadvanced website indexing or downgrading tostandard indexing.** You must wait for the upgrade or downgrade to complete before deleting the data store.## Procedure
To delete a data store, follow these steps:- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **Search and Conversation** page, and then click **Data stores** . [Go to the Data stores page](https://console.cloud.google.com/gen-app-builder/data-stores) 
- For the data store that you want to delete, click more_vert , and then click **Delete** .
